Package org.apache.jmeter.engine

Interface JMeterEngine

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientJMeterEngine, StandardJMeterEngine
    public interface JMeterEngine
    This interface is implemented by classes that can run JMeter tests.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void configure​(HashTree testPlan)
      Configure engine
      void exit()
      Exit engine
      boolean isActive()  
      void reset()
      Stop test if running
      void runTest()
      Runs the test
      void setProperties​(java.util.Properties p)
      set Properties on engine
      default void stopTest()
      Stop test immediately interrupting current samplers
      void stopTest​(boolean now)  

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        void configure​(HashTree testPlan)
        Configure engine
        Parameters:
        testPlan - the test plan

      • runTest

        void runTest()
      throws JMeterEngineException
        Runs the test
        Throws:
        JMeterEngineException - if an error occurs

      • stopTest

        default void stopTest()
        Stop test immediately interrupting current samplers

      • stopTest

        void stopTest​(boolean now)
        Parameters:
        now - boolean that tell whether stop is immediate (interrupt) or not (wait for current sample end)

      • reset

        void reset()
        Stop test if running

      • setProperties

        void setProperties​(java.util.Properties p)
        set Properties on engine
        Parameters:
        p - the properties to set

      • exit

        void exit()
        Exit engine

      • isActive

        boolean isActive()
        Returns:
        boolean Flag to show whether engine is active (true when test is running). Set to false at end of test
